text:
Ah yeah,
That was on the forecast, wasn't it.
I wonder if it'll pile up～

Haha
Sounds like you're hoping it will

Obvs～
We could make snowmen, and have a snowball fight～
You don't seem to into it though, Producer?

There's a part of me that wants to be excited for it,
but if it snows too much, it's a real pain to drive.

!! Oh hey! I'll help you with shoveling the snow!
If I do that, then you can enjoy the snow more too, Producer!
